content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1564605501023{padding-top: 92px !important;padding-bottom: 79px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[vc_column_text]

À la Carte Menu

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A Trendy Edition of Seductive French Cuisine

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]
[vc_column_text]

A gloriously-colourful Le Bistro à la Carte Menu consists of new and not-so-new bistro classics such as côte de boeuf with fat chips, foie gras terrine and peach marmalade, tuna tartar and pea and goats’ cheese risotto offers distinctive taste and buzzy atmosphere with more than a touch of street theatre.

Browse through:

  • Le Bistro Esplanade À la Carte Menu
  • Le Bistro Esplanade Beverage List
  • Breakfast Menu
  • Le Bistro Esplanade Kids’ Menu

Working hours:
9 am – 11 pm

Book your table:
T. +385 1 4566 611
E. lebistro@esplanade.hr

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
